document_name: Act No. 314/2012 Coll. on regular inspection of heating systems and air conditioning systems
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/SVK/2012/SVK-2012-09-18-Act No. 314_2012 Coll. on regular inspection of heating systems and air conditioning systems_21551eedef5c7f43fa0cf5c3070b6531.pdf
document_description:
The Act mandates the regular audit of heating systems (nominal power > 20 kW) and air conditioning systems (nominal power > 12 kW)in order to provide better information to the system operator about the system performance as well as opportunities for system maintenance leading to better energy efficiency and thus contributing to the fight against climate change.

The operator of the systems can be fined for not having scheduled and done an audit within mandated deadline. However, the recommendations given by the auditor are non-binding.
